amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Safe and Appropriate Foster Care Placement Requirements for Titles IV-E and IV-B," regarding a foster child's LGBTQI+ identity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
